name: Peter Pham
title: High School Senior

work.description: A lot of really cool stuff happened at this place. As for now, this will be acting as a placeholder.

sports.name: Cross Country
sports.details: Four year cross country athlete with practice everyday after school during the fall and conditioning weekday mornings in the summer.

sports.name: Track
sports.details: Four year track athlete with practice everyday after school during the spring and conditioning in the winter.

clubs.name: Thunder Service Club
clubs.details: Work with other club members to develop a strong group of peers while completing service within the school and community.

clubs.name: Thunder Broadcasting Network
clubs.details: Assist the broadcasting network by completing a variety of tasks, such as camera operator, and being a flexible member in order to produce a live broadcast of school games and events.

clubs.name: Spikeball Club
clubs.details: Assist the club leaders by acting as an instructor for new players.

others.name: Website
others.details: Learn the basics of computer programming and web design by creating and maintaining a website, while exploring and implementing topics and programs of interest.

others.name: House Captain
others.details: Assist the Community Captains and school leaders with an assortment of tasks. Supervise a 'house' which consists of a group of 20 students ranging from freshman to seniors. Plan and direct activities everyday to foster community and friendship among students.

others.name: National Honors Society
others.details: Maintain a high gpa, be in good standing with administration, and complete service within the school and community.

others.name: Student Ambassador
others.details: Volunteer for school activities and serve as a guide for middle schoolers seeking to learn more about high school.

awards: Kindest Kansas Citian Essay Award Winner
